程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.indexing

接口 IndexProvider

所有超级接口:
IndexInformation
所有已知实现类:
MetricInstrumentedIndexProvider
public interface IndexProvider
extends IndexInformation
External index for querying. An index can contain an arbitrary number of index stores which are updated and queried separately.
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

  • 字段概要

  • 字段详细资料

    • REPLACEMENT_CHAR

      static final char REPLACEMENT_CHAR
      另请参阅:

  • 方法详细资料

    • checkKeyValidity

      static void checkKeyValidity​(String key)

    • register

      void register​(String store, String key, KeyInformation information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      This method registers a new key for the specified index store with the given data type. This allows the IndexProvider to prepare the index if necessary. It is expected that this method is first called with each new key to inform the index of the expected type before the key is used in any documents.
      参数:
      store - Index store
      key - New key to register
      information - Information on the key to register
      tx - enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • mutate

      void mutate​(Map<String,​Map<String,​IndexMutation>> mutations, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      Mutates the index (adds and removes fields or entire documents)
      参数:
      mutations - Updates to the index. First map contains all the mutations for each store. The inner map contains all changes for each document in an IndexMutation.
      information - Information on the keys used in the mutation accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      IndexMutation

    • restore

      void restore​(Map<String,​Map<String,​List<IndexEntry>>> documents, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      Restores the index to the state of the primary data store as given in the documents variable. When this method returns, the index records for the given documents exactly matches the provided data. Unlike mutate(java.util.Map, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever, BaseTransaction) this method does not do a delta-update, but entirely replaces the documents with the provided data or deletes them if the document content is empty.
      参数:
      documents - The outer map maps stores to documents, the inner contains the documents mapping document ids to the document content which is a list of IndexEntry. If that list is empty, that means this document should not exist and ought to be deleted.
      information - Information on the keys used in the mutation accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • queryCount

      Long queryCount​(IndexQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • query

      Stream<String> query​(IndexQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      Executes the given query against the index.
      参数:
      query - Query to execute
      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:
      The ids of all matching documents
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      IndexQuery

    • query

      Stream<RawQuery.Result<String>> query​(RawQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      Executes the given raw query against the index
      参数:
      query - Query to execute
      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:
      Results objects for all matching documents (i.e. document id and score)
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      RawQuery

    • totals

      Long totals​(RawQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      Executes the given raw query against the index and returns the total hits. e.g. limit=0
      参数:
      query - Query to execute
      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:
      Long total hits for query
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      RawQuery

    • beginTransaction

      BaseTransactionConfigurable beginTransaction​(BaseTransactionConfig config) throws BackendException
      Returns a transaction handle for a new index transaction.
      返回:
      New Transaction Handle
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • close

      void close() throws BackendException
      Closes the index
      抛出:
      BackendException

      Clears the index and removes all entries in all stores.
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • exists

      boolean exists() throws BackendException
      Checks whether the index exists.
      返回:

      抛出:
      BackendException
